low_confidence_queries.query: 我需要导出本季度各产品线的良品率和返工率的详细数据报告
客户那边预计几点到货
合同快到期了需要续签
各工序的人员分配合理吗
能不能导出这个月的数据
成本加成定价法算一下

recommendations.title: Add 102 missing intents to label mapping and training data
recommendations.description: Tests expect 102 intents that have ZERO training samples and are not in the label mapping. Top ones by failure frequency: INVENTORY_QUERY (86 failures), FOOD_SAFETY_CERT_QUERY (59 failures), TRACE_DOWNSTREAM (48 failures), HR_EMPLOYEE_LIST (24 failures), LABEL_PRINT (24 failures).
recommendations.impact: These intents can NEVER be correctly classified by BERT since they do not exist in the model output space.
recommendations.effort: High - requires regenerating training data, retraining model, updating label_mapping.json from 177 to ~250+ labels

recommendations.title: Merge 9 groups of duplicate intents (13 redundant labels)
recommendations.description: There are 9 groups of semantically identical intents wasting ~1,300 training samples. Examples: HR_DELETE_EMPLOYEE / HR_EMPLOYEE_DELETE / HRM_DELETE_EMPLOYEE all mean the same thing.
recommendations.impact: Reduces confusion, frees up label space for genuinely new intents, improves decision boundaries.
recommendations.effort: Medium - merge labels in KB, regenerate training data, update Java intent handlers

recommendations.title: Add hard negatives for top 10 confusion pairs
recommendations.description: The BERT model frequently confuses: QUALITY_CHECK_EXECUTE vs QUALITY_CHECK_QUERY (22x), COST_TREND_ANALYSIS vs REPORT_FINANCE (16x), TRACE_PUBLIC vs TRACE_BATCH (13x). These need explicit hard negative training samples.
recommendations.impact: Could reduce classifier failure rate by 30-40% for the most confused intent pairs.
recommendations.effort: Medium - add 20-30 hard negative samples per confusion pair, retrain

recommendations.title: Improve training sample diversity beyond template-based augmentation
recommendations.description: The generate_full_training_data_v2.py script uses template-based augmentation with domain synonyms. All 177 intents have exactly 100-176 samples each. The samples follow repetitive patterns. Real user queries are much more diverse.
recommendations.effort: Medium - collect real user queries from production logs, use LLM-based augmentation

recommendations.title: Fix MAX_LENGTH mismatch: training=64, inference=128
recommendations.description: Training uses max_length=64 but the classifier service uses max_length=128 at inference. The model was never trained on inputs longer than 64 tokens.
recommendations.impact: Better handling of complex, multi-part user queries.
recommendations.effort: Low - change MAX_LENGTH in finetune_full.py and retrain

recommendations.title: Fix financial_ratios - uses snake_case instead of UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
recommendations.description: All 176 intents use UPPER_SNAKE_CASE except "financial_ratios" which uses lower_snake_case. Should be renamed to FINANCIAL_RATIOS.

recommendations.title: Add negative_keywords to 147/183 intents that have none
recommendations.description: 147 out of 183 KB intents have zero negative_keywords. These are used for generating hard negatives in training data.

recommendations.title: Incorporate 780 incremental/augmentation samples into model
recommendations.description: There are 780 additional samples (466 incremental + 163 v3 + 71 v4 + 80 v5) covering high-frequency intents. These were NOT used in the current model training.
recommendations.impact: Better coverage of the most common user queries.
recommendations.effort: Low - merge into full_training_data.jsonl and retrain

recommendations.title: Update model config.json to use real label names instead of LABEL_X
recommendations.description: The model config.json has id2label mapping like {"0": "LABEL_0"} instead of {"0": "ALERT_ACKNOWLEDGE"}.
recommendations.impact: Minor - only affects debugging and model inspection.

recommendations.title: Align test suite expected intents with actual model capabilities
recommendations.description: Tests expect 246 unique intents but the model only knows 177. Many test "expected" intents are aliases. Either add missing intents or update test expectations.
recommendations.impact: More accurate test results and clearer gap analysis.
